#summary A description of the database structure.

= Introduction =

  * gClasses - Stores icons and graphic representation
  * gObjects - Stores physical instances
  * gLinks - Stores links between gObjects
  * gStatuses - Stores status to be displayed on the links
  * gLogs - Stores logs from status changes
  * gPerformances 
  * gProperties
  * gUsers
